name: shouldFailWhenNoAdminSecretName()
description: Should fail when no admin secret name is specified
descriptionHtml: Should fail when no admin secret name is specified

testStage.description: Should fail when no admin secret name is specified

steps.name: Given I have configured a secret with admin credentials to a remote Keycloak server
When I request an SSO Capability that is externally provided to a non-existing admin secret
Then an EntandoControllerException is thrown by the CapabilityProvider
Executing command PROVIDE_CAPABILITY

steps.name: And the resulting status objects of both the ProvidedCapability and EntandoKeycloakServer reflect the failure and the cause for the failure
The phase of the statuses of both the ProvidedCapability and EntandoKeycloakServer is FAILED
And the statuses of  both the ProvidedCapability and EntandoKeycloakServer reflect the correct error message

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a controller developer, I would like request a capability that will allow me to use an external Keycloak service so that I can leverage an existing user database
